testcase.name: Validate Selling and Buying Price
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "LoginPage"................................................passed And User clicks on the button "DemoMode"....................................passed And User clicks on the button "LoginTab"....................................passed When User enter the value in the text box "UserEmail" "cm.jnanesh@gmail.com".passed When User enter the value in the text box "Password" "plus500_jna"..........passed And User clicks on the button "Login".......................................passed Then User is on "HomePage"..................................................passed Then User Verifies the page title "Plus500 WebTrader | Leading CFD Platform | Online Trading".passed When User enter the value in the text box "Search" "GBP/USD"................passed Then User Press Enter "Search"..............................................passed Then User Validate "Sell" Price with the Threshold "1.2" "1.4"..............passed Then User Validate "Buy" Price with the Threshold "1.2" "1.4"...............passed
